description: A message that appears while the 'pin' action is resolving on the server
A message that informs the user a 'pin' action is finished and a redirect is about to happen
defaultMessage: Done, redirecting to new main item…

description: Banner displayed after items are detached successfully

Label for a button that lets the user set the media item they are clicking to be the 'main' one, conceptually. It replaces whatever the current main item is, and that main item becomes a child (like this one they are clicking, effectively swapping places).
Label for a button that lets the user set the media item they are clicking to be _not_ matched to its parent media item.
Dialog title prompting user to select a destination folder for the item
Button to commit the action of moving item
